remarks: The image of an inverse under a functor is an inverse.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
funcinv.s $e |- I = ( Inv ` D ) $.
funcinv.t $e |- J = ( Inv ` E ) $.
funcinv.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) $.
funcinv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
funcinv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
funcinv.m $e |- ( ph -> M ( X I Y ) N ) $.
funcinv $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) ) $.
